Kinematics

Contains logic to manage the coordinate system reference position

Functions
RunMachineKinematics
call Kinematics.RunMachineKinematics();

Calculates position relative to the machine zero position

RunPartKinematics
call Kinematics.RunPartKinematics();

Calculates position relative to the part zero position

RotateAboutPointAbs
call Kinematics.RotateAboutPointAbs(
xCenter,
yCenter,
zCenter,
aRotation,
bRotation,
cRotation
);

Applies an absolute rotation around a specified point in the Cartesian coordinate system

Parameters
xCenter

The current point's center in the X axis

yCenter

The current point's center in the Y axis

zCenter

The current point's center in the Z axis

aRotation

absolute rotation relative to current point's X axis

bRotation

absolute rotation relative to current point's Y axis

cRotation

absolute rotation relative to current point's Z axis

RotateAboutPointInc
call Kinematics.RotateAboutPointInc(
xCenter,
yCenter,
zCenter,
aRotation,
bRotation,
cRotation
);

Applies an incremental rotation around a specified point in the Cartesian coordinate system

Parameters
xCenter

The current point's center in the X axis

yCenter

The current point's center in the Y axis

zCenter

The current point's center in the Z axis

aRotation

incremental rotation around current point's X axis

bRotation

incremental rotation around current point's Y axis

cRotation

incremental rotation around current point's Z axis

CancelRotateAboutPoint
call Kinematics.CancelRotateAboutPoint();

Ends the rotation around a specified point
